price: ገንዘቦቻቸውና ልጆቻቸው ከአላህ (ቅጣት) ምንንም ከእነርሱ አያድኗቸውም፡፡ እነዚያ የእሳት ጓዶች ናቸው፡፡ እነርሱ በእርሷ ውስጥ ዘውታሪዎች ናቸው፡፡
arabic: لَّن تُغۡنِيَ عَنۡهُمۡ أَمۡوَٰلُهُمۡ وَلَآ أَوۡلَٰدُهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيۡـًٔاۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلنَّارِۖ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lan tugh'niya ʿanhum amwāluhum walā awlāduhum mina al-lahi shayan ulāika aṣḥābu al-nāri hum fīhā khālidūna
